mapper.select: select count(*) from xm_zjdw t where 1=1 and xmbm=#{xmbm} and to_number(sbthcd)<=to_number(#{sbthcd})
select count(*) from XM_GSD_JHXD t where 1=1 and xmid=#{xmbm}
select * from xm_zjdw t where id=#{id}

select distinct xmmc,nvl(dwzj,0) dwzj,nvl(yshdwzj,0) yshdwzj,nvl(xdbz,0) jhxdzj,nvl(jhxdcgs,0) jhxdcgs,(case when round(nvl(jhxdstz,0),2)<0 then 0 else round(nvl(jhxdstz,0),2) end) jhxdstz,round(nvl(jhxdttc,0),2) jhxdttc,round(nvl(jhxdrys,0),2) jhxdrys,round(nvl(jhxdtdk,0),2) jhxdtdk,round(nvl(jhxddfzc,0),2) jhxddfzc,round(nvl(xdbz,0),2) xdbz from xmjbxx_zb xm left join (select xmbm,sum(ztz-dfzc-yhdk) dwzj,sum(decode(shzt,'已审核',ztz-dfzc-yhdk,0)) yshdwzj from xm_zjdw where to_number(sbthcd)<=to_number(#{sbthcd}) group by xmbm) dw on xm.xmbm=dw.xmbm left join (select xmid xmbm,sum(nvl(ztz,0)) jhxdzj,sum(nvl(btzzj,0)) jhxdcgs,sum(nvl(stz,0)) jhxdstz,sum(nvl(gz,0))+sum(nvl(sz,0))+sum(nvl(zq,0))+sum(nvl(dk,0))+sum(nvl(jl,0))+sum(nvl(qt,0))+sum(nvl(stz,0))+sum(nvl(ttc,0))+sum(nvl(zddzjl,0)) jhxdttc,sum(nvl(dk,0)) jhxdtdk,sum(nvl(rys,0)) jhxdrys,sum(nvl(dfzc,0))+sum(nvl(yhdk,0)) jhxddfzc,sum(nvl(btzzj,0))+sum(nvl(gz,0))+sum(nvl(sz,0))+sum(nvl(zq,0))+sum(nvl(dk,0))+sum(nvl(jl,0))+sum(nvl(qt,0))+sum(nvl(rys,0))+sum(nvl(stz,0)) xdbz from xm_gsd_jhxd group by xmid) xd on xm.xmbm=xd.xmbm where xm.xmbm=#{xmbm}
mapper.insert:
insert into xm_zjdw
xmbm, ztz, cgs, gz, sz, zq, tdk, jl, qt, rys, dfzc, yhdk, stz, jhxdwh, bd, sbthcd, xsbzt, ssbzt, dwyf, ttc, tbr, tbsj, zddzjl,
#{xmbm}, #{ztz}, #{cgs}, #{gz}, #{sz}, #{zq}, #{tdk}, #{jl}, #{qt}, #{rys}, #{dfzc}, #{yhdk}, #{stz}, #{jhxdwh}, #{bd}, #{sbthcd}, #{xsbzt}, #{ssbzt}, #{dwyf}, #{ttc}, #{tbr}, #{tbsj}, #{zddzjl},
mapper.select: delete from xm_zjdw where 1=1 and ${id}
select * from XTGL_DEPARTMENT t where t.parent=#{gydw} and (t.id not like '%000_' or t.id like '%0000') order by t.id

select t.*,decode(parent,'11101360000',decode(substr(id,-2),'00',1,0),0) sfds,decode(parent,'11101360000',0,1) sftj from XTGL_DEPARTMENT t where (t.parent=#{gydw} or id like substr(#{gydw},0,decode(instr(#{gydw},'00'),0,length(#{gydw}),instr(#{gydw},'00')-1))||'%' ) and parent !='36'
order by t.id
select * from xm_zjdw where 1=1 and gydwdm=#{gydwdm} and dwyf=#{dwyf} and jhxdwh=#{jhxdwh}
mapper.insert:
insert into xm_zjdw
xsbzt,ssbzt,shzt, ztz, cgs, rys, ttc, dfzc, bd, dwyf, jhxdwh, parent, gydwdm, xmbm, nf, tbr, tbsj,
'已上报','已上报','已审核', #{ztz}, #{cgs}, #{rys}, #{ttc}, #{dfzc}, #{bd}, #{dwyf}, #{jhxdwh}, #{parent}, #{gydwdm}, #{xmbm}, #{nf}, #{tbr}, #{tbsj},
mapper.select: select * from xm_zjdw z where dwyf=#{dwyf} and z.parent=#{gydwdm} and nf=#{nf} and jhxdwh=#{jhxdwh} order by gydwdm
select * from xm_zjdw z where dwyf=#{dwyf} and (z.parent=#{gydwdm} or gydwdm like rtrim(#{gydwdm}, '0')||'%') and nf=#{nf} and jhxdwh=#{jhxdwh} order by gydwdm
mapper.insert: insert into xm_zjdw (id,jhxdwh,ztz,cgs,rys,ttc,dfzc,dwyf,xmbm,tbr,tbsj,sbthcd,xsbzt) values(sys_guid(),#{10},#{11}+#{12}+#{13}+#{14},#{11},#{12},#{14},#{13},#{15},#{0},#{16},#{17},#{SBTHCD},decode(#{SBTHCD},9,'已上报','未上报'))
mapper.update: update xm_jyzj set jyzj=#{JYZJ} WHERE XMBM=#{XMBM}
mapper.select: select * from xm_jyzj where xmbm in (${value})
